Golf Equity Membership
Enjoy an active golf lifestyle that embraces the camaraderie and traditions of the game on our Larry Packard design, featuring his double dog-leg par 5s. U.S. Open winner Ken Venturi enjoyed Eagle Creek and so can you.
With a soft cap of 365 golfing members, Eagle Creek is one of the few courses in Naples you can walk at any time. Magnificently reimagined by notable, local architect Gordon Lewis in 2021, you’ll soon discover why we are Naples’ best kept secret.
The goal for the number of golf membership is 365 ensuring that members have access to the golf course as often as they wish.
Click HERE to view a hole-by-hole video of our Golf Course
For additional information, please contact:
Membership & Communications Director
239-793-0500
Communications@EagleCreekCC.org

#leftSideBar3

Social Membership
Our “right sized” intimate community encourages closer friendships and sporting partners with no compromise in amenities and activities featured in larger clubs.
At Eagle Creek you also have the programs, equipment and professional instruction and encouragement to embrace a healthier lifestyle.
Featuring fitness classes in-season, full gym, 7-har-tru tennis courts, 3 grass bocce courts, active social calendar, poolside cafe and more!
Social Members enjoy year-round privileges of the golf practice facilities and out of season golf privileges, May 1-November 30th. Membership is required when purchasing a property at Eagle Creek.
Click HERE to view hole-by-hole tour of our golf course
For additional information, please contact:
Membership & Communications Director
239-793-0500
Communications@EagleCreekCC.org

#bannerText
#bannerImage
Membership & Real Estate
Located on 300 acres of natural beauty between Marco Island and downtown Naples lies the gated community of Eagle Creek. With just 460 total residences, this small village setting encourages closer friendships and sporting partners with no compromise in amenities and activities featured at larger clubs. Eagle Creek homeowners are required to have either a Golf Equity or a Social Equity Membership.
Interested in Membership
Link Text
Golf Equity Membership
Enjoy a golf course without the bundled Chelsea system, where you can walk at any time. Designed by Larry Packard and featuring his double-dog par fives, you’ll soon find out why Eagle Creek has been voted Naples’ Best since 2018. Enjoy being one of 365 coveted golf members on a course where memories are made, and traditions are honored.
CLICK TO EXPLORE
Link Text
Social Membership
Our full social calendar combined with our welcoming, vibrant lifestyle will keep you active even if you don’t play golf. Take lessons from our tennis pro or enjoy the camaraderie of mixed doubles on our seven har-tru tennis courts. Work-out in our full gym or partake in group fitness classes featuring yoga, strength training, Zumba and more. Celebrate occasions with fellow members, enjoy a dinner dance, or stop by for a causal drink on The Veranda. The hardest part will be deciding what to do first.
CLICK TO EXPLORE
Link Text
Rental Information
The Renter Membership Program provides individuals and families the opportunity to experience Eagle Creek's award-winning amenities, facilities and everyday life in Southwest Florida. For over 30 years, Eagle Creek has delivered unforgettable hospitality to members, renters and their guests. We welcome you to be our guest in paradise. People from around the world call our club "home".
CLICK TO EXPLORE

Membership & Real Estate
Property Listings
View Property Listings
Rentals
View Rentals
“Live here, play here, make lifelong friends here”
Welcome home. You’ve arrived at one of Naples’ most coveted enclaves, Eagle Creek. Where the symphony of life’s natural beauty and art have harmonized for 40 years on over 300 acres. Our small village setting lends itself to cultivating friendships, lasting a lifetime. Developed in the 1980’s, thoughtful consideration was given to creating a low-density community, perfecting the balance of real estate nestled within an artfully created golf course by Larry Packard.
As a resident, you can select from one of 460 residents offering Condominiums with the largest lanais in Naples, Carriage Home Villas with detached guest suites, and well-appointed Estate Homes featuring panoramic golf-course views. Floorplans excel with spacious, open and brightly lit layouts. Available in 1,2 and 3 bedroom configurations, you'll find the perfect residence to accommodate your desires. Built when attention to detail was an envied skill, our residences are now enjoying a renovation revival that deserves a closer look. Carefully crafted and beautifully designed when home building was more an art than commerce, our top-drawer renovations, such as chef-inspired kitchens and spa-like bathrooms, challenge many new communities in both comfort and luxury. We invite you to make the comparisons with other communities and you'll easily choose Eagle Creek over others.
Enjoy living at Eagle Creek Golf & Country Club, where we offer condos, estate homes, villas and beautiful courtyard pool homes!
.inner
